title: Re-run deployment and verify app is live

requirements.text: Re-run the deployment of the current application build and verify that it completes successfully after the prior deployment error, with the app reachable and basic functionality intact.
acceptanceCriteria: A new deployment run is triggered using the current repository state.
The deployment run completes successfully (no build/deploy error status).
After deployment, the app loads to the Home page without a fatal error.
Basic navigation works (Home -> Match History -> Home).

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not add new product features solely to address deployment.
Do not change the technology stack or introduce external infrastructure.
